name: Debugger2Client
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
V2
Debugger2Client
description:
The Debugger service provides the API that allows users to collect run-time information from a running application, without stopping or slowing it down and without modifying its state. An application may include one or more replicated processes performing the same work.

The application is represented using the Debuggee concept. The Debugger service provides a way to query for available Debuggees, but does not provide a way to create one. A debuggee is created using the Controller service, usually by running a debugger agent with the application.

The Debugger service enables the client to set one or more Breakpoints on a Debuggee and collect the results of the set Breakpoints.

params.name: service_path
params.description: The domain name of the API remote host.

params.name: port
params.description: The port on which to connect to the remote host.

params.name: channel
params.description: A Channel object through which to make calls.

params.name: chan_creds
params.description: A ChannelCredentials for the setting up the RPC client.

params.name: updater_proc
params.description:
A function that transforms the metadata for requests, e.g., to give
OAuth credentials.

params.name: scopes
params.description:
The OAuth scopes for this service. This parameter is ignored if
an updater_proc is supplied.

params.name: client_config
params.description:
A Hash for call options for each method. See
Google::Gax#construct_settings for the structure of
this data. Falls back to the default config if not specified
or the specified config is missing data points.

params.name: timeout
params.description: The default timeout, in seconds, for calls made through this client.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/debugger/v2"

Breakpoint = Google::Devtools::Clouddebugger::V2::Breakpoint
Debugger2Client = Google::Cloud::Debugger::V2::Debugger2Client

debugger2_client = Debugger2Client.new
debuggee_id = ''
breakpoint = Breakpoint.new
client_version = ''
response = debugger2_client.set_breakpoint(debuggee_id, breakpoint, client_version)

params.name: debuggee_id
params.description: ID of the debuggee where the breakpoint is to be set.

params.name: breakpoint
params.description:
Breakpoint specification to set.
The field ‘location’ of the breakpoint must be set.

params.name: client_version
params.description:
The client version making the call.
Following: +domain/type/version+ (e.g., +google.com/intellij/v1+).

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/debugger/v2"

Debugger2Client = Google::Cloud::Debugger::V2::Debugger2Client

debugger2_client = Debugger2Client.new
debuggee_id = ''
breakpoint_id = ''
client_version = ''
response = debugger2_client.get_breakpoint(debuggee_id, breakpoint_id, client_version)

params.name: debuggee_id
params.description: ID of the debuggee whose breakpoint to get.

params.name: breakpoint_id
params.description: ID of the breakpoint to get.

params.name: client_version
params.description:
The client version making the call.
Following: +domain/type/version+ (e.g., +google.com/intellij/v1+).

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/debugger/v2"

Debugger2Client = Google::Cloud::Debugger::V2::Debugger2Client

debugger2_client = Debugger2Client.new
debuggee_id = ''
breakpoint_id = ''
client_version = ''
debugger2_client.delete_breakpoint(debuggee_id, breakpoint_id, client_version)

params.name: debuggee_id
params.description: ID of the debuggee whose breakpoint to delete.

params.name: breakpoint_id
params.description: ID of the breakpoint to delete.

params.name: client_version
params.description:
The client version making the call.
Following: +domain/type/version+ (e.g., +google.com/intellij/v1+).

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/debugger/v2"

Debugger2Client = Google::Cloud::Debugger::V2::Debugger2Client

debugger2_client = Debugger2Client.new
debuggee_id = ''
client_version = ''
response = debugger2_client.list_breakpoints(debuggee_id, client_version)

params.name: debuggee_id
params.description: ID of the debuggee whose breakpoints to list.

params.name: client_version
params.description:
The client version making the call.
Following: +domain/type/version+ (e.g., +google.com/intellij/v1+).

params.name: include_all_users
params.description:
When set to +true+, the response includes the list of breakpoints set by
any user. Otherwise, it includes only breakpoints set by the caller.

params.name: include_inactive
params.description:
When set to +true+, the response includes active and inactive
breakpoints. Otherwise, it includes only active breakpoints.

params.name: action
params.description: When set, the response includes only breakpoints with the specified action.

params.name: strip_results
params.description:
This field is deprecated. The following fields are always stripped out of
the result: +stack_frames+, +evaluated_expressions+ and +variable_table+.

params.name: wait_token
params.description:
A wait token that, if specified, blocks the call until the breakpoints
list has changed, or a server selected timeout has expired.  The value
should be set from the last response. The error code
+google.rpc.Code.ABORTED+ (RPC) is returned on wait timeout, which
should be called again with the same +wait_token+.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

methods.name: list_debuggees
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
V2
Debugger2Client#list_debuggees
methods.description: Lists all the debuggees that the user can set breakpoints to.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/debugger/v2"

Debugger2Client = Google::Cloud::Debugger::V2::Debugger2Client

debugger2_client = Debugger2Client.new
project = ''
client_version = ''
response = debugger2_client.list_debuggees(project, client_version)

params.name: project
params.description: Project number of a Google Cloud project whose debuggees to list.

params.name: client_version
params.description:
The client version making the call.
Following: +domain/type/version+ (e.g., +google.com/intellij/v1+).

params.name: include_inactive
params.description:
When set to +true+, the result includes all debuggees. Otherwise, the
result includes only debuggees that are active.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.
